title: Shifting Hearts
description: It is said that the eyes are the windows to the soul, but what if the soul that looks back isn't as human as you first thought?These seven captivating and unique love stories shine a spotlight on otherkinâ€” people who spiritually identify as being something other than human. From non-human mystical creatures to ravens, coyotes, cats and dogs; each tale is a fresh and exciting window into the otherkin subculture. Go on a journey where love isn't always where you thought to find it, or who you thought to find it in. Authors include Lauren Brownless, Elizabeth Coppen, Esther Day, Rai Scodras, Lyn Thorne-Alder and Chris Witham.
author: Lauren Brownless
